Name: Critic - Lucia
Desc: When a <Icon=IconCafeRed/> customer is seated in Period 1-3, gain permanent <Icon=IconCafeCoffee/> +5. When any <Icon=IconCafeRed/> customer is seated throughout Period 1-3, <Icon=IconCafeRed/>'s <Icon=IconCafeCoffee/> +50%.

Name: Critic - Karenina
